name: Secret Laboratory
description: Secret Laboratory is a shooter with multiple options. You can play first person or third person, in a very fast and easy way to change.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 150 MB available space
